attributes.action: protect the world heritage site of Stonehenge and surrounding areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stonehenge is a world heritage site that was short listed just recently for one of the seven wonders of the world. with the cancellation of the upgrade to the a303 do we really want something built nearby which will add to the light, noise, and traffic pollution this site is already subjected to. please help us to maintain our local and world heritage sites for future generations.
